reviews.review_msg: Jerry is a great guy, but his class is redudant. There is no real need to go to class, just read the relevent sections of the textbook and write 4 800 word essays; however, going to class and leaving at the break is also an option.
This course topic is interesting, but the professor is not.

Notes uploaded before class starts, no point in going. 4, 800 word essays to be summited online. chance to rewrite first two assignments but he does not tell you where you went wrong and just make you seek a peer tutor via SFU. 3 hour lecture is boring and worthless to attend. Just read textbook and notes to complete assignment.

Professor Campbell is extremely understanding, passionate and knowledgeable. Every week you must submit a 200-250 word reflection based on the reading (given to you on Canvas), and complete a quiz. This class is all discussion but you get what you put in and he's very fair. Highly recommend but be prepared to work, read and debate

He is AMAZING! His interest for the course is definitely worth taking the course. He is extremely helpful + super kind- always smiling! You need the courseware for sure- there arees every class worth like 30% of your grade. But they're not too difficult as long as you read the course readings every week. Overall, it's easy to excel in this class

His classes were awesome! It sometimes may be boring because he talks to himself for the 3 hour lecture, however, if you listen to what he talks about, sometimes new ideas or thoughts might come to your mind and give you a "click". discussions and quizzes are worth 40% and 30% of your final grade. basically you'll get 40% for your discussion :)

You honestly learn so much in this class- it is totally worth your time. Ya the material may be a bit dry, but you do discussions for majority of the seminar class. Its all about your own opinion.. and in most post secondary classes you don't get to voice your own opinion enough. Best prof ever!!
I am really enjoying the class! Very attractive and interesting topics!
I really enjoyed this class. It was formatted a little differently but if you keep up with the readings you should be fine. Out of the lower div. education classes this was by far my favourite.
I really enjoyed this class. It was formatted a little differently but if you keep up with the readings you should be fine. Out of the lower div. education classes this was by far my favourite.
I really enjoyed this class. It was formatted a little differently but if you keep up with the readings you should be fine. Out of the lower div. education classes this was by far my favourite.
Amazing Prof. Amazing class! I would take another class that he taught just because he is teaching it! Take this class if you can!!!!!

I totally recommend this professor. He tries to get to know his students. Marks fairly easily, just wants to know you are thinking about the material. Nice guy.  Can be a bit dry at times though.  But overall good.

Class is 3hrs and very interactive. Prof was nice but somewhat scattered. Lots of reading. A couple papers and there are group projects, not all projects are related. Relies heavily on self-reflection. Seems to be easy marker.
I wish she had done more to make the course less dry and I wish she gave personalized feedback on work but still a good professor. Accommadating, kind, and approachable
doesnt really seem focused on teaching or students. but it's an easy class because you dont learn anything so if you like that then this is for you
Seems nice and class is easy enough but so boring and dry. She doesnt really teach nor does it seem like she plans anything
absolutely amazing, cared for the entire class. remember details about each student and continued to ask about them and check in on us. finished the class with a 97%
Very caring and compassionate! She made the content enjoyable.

Fatima is a kind and extremely passionate professor. She gives amazing feedback and ultimately gives students ample opportunity to succeed. My only complaint about the course was that the textbook was not accessible other than purchasing it, and it was expensive ($200+ for a fresh copy). Definitely try and get a used copy from someone if you can!
Easy A. Class was relatively dry, and the papers were marked leniently, but fairly. Presentation was also simple enough. Would recommend as a GPA booster.

Fatima was an awesome professor this semester. I had her as my business TA in the past and she was awesome. Her being a prof for Educ250 was absolutely awesome. She is a gem and her class is enjoyable. This class really opens up your perspective and if this prof is ever teaching definately, absolutely take it. No doubt the best prof.

Fatima was a very sweet prof. Her class was very dry, but really easy. The only assignments that were marked were a short 300 word midterm paper, final paper and two small projects. Fatima gave great feedback on assignments and was always available to answer questions outside of class. She really cares about students success

He's a well-respected prof for a reasonhe's kind, intelligent, and inspiring. However, I noticed he often came to class unprepared, resulting in personal tangents. Lectures would sometimes be cancelled 2h before start time and I felt like it was a waste of my money and time (each lecture was around 2h 50min long). Easy marker/easy class though!
